name: Ladies 'la flor' Blouse
description:
Exquisite embroidery on bright colours! A blouse that can easily be worn with shorts in the summer or jeans in the winter. The vibrancy of tones simply make you happy. 

These are 100% cotton. They are a generous size and a lovely loose fit. 

We have three sizes in the La Flor:
Small - fit 8-10
Medium - fit 10-12
Large - fit 12-16


Muchas Gracias!

name: Zita Dress
description:
The incredibly divine mix of stunning embroidery on the beautiful lush cotton, make our Zita Dress delightfully elegant. 

The embroidery is both back and front around the decolletage and cover the full capped sleeve. There is also a beautiful embroidery down the front center of the dress.

Zita would suit a large 8 - small 16. It is not a fitted dress and is meant to loosely hang on the figure. The stunning hand embroidery means that minimal jewelery need be worn, perhaps a pair of drop earrings.

Take Zita to a beautiful candle lit dinner by the sea or to a dinner party. Her beautiful floaty fit make her a comfort to wear. Imagine that, stunning and comfortable all in the one dress. 

100% cotton, Handmade in Mexico
Please note that each item is made with love and care by an artisan, so we can not promise that an item will be repeated. They will all be in the same style as the images shown and I will upload a picture of what we have in stock so you can see the colour combos. These are not factory made so we often only stock one in each colour.

Length does vary but is approx 95-100cm on each dress

name: KIKI Skirt
description:
These light weight 100% cotton KIKI Skirts are a summer must. Perfect for a fiesta picnic or a day at the beach.

One size fits most (8-14) and have an eleastic waistband.

name: Bettina Dress
description:
Bettina is a dress to remember. A beauty that will bring joy the moment you gaze upon her. 

The stunning artistry is out of this world and that these pieces are hand made, mind blowing.

Bettina best fits a 10-16 and the embroidery is very flattering on the figure. Each piece is unique and we buy them direct from the artisan.

name: Short Las Flores
description:
The stunning short Las Flores is great piece for summer or over tights in the cooler months. It has the same sublime embroidery as the original but is a little more cheeky. 

Small - 8 (84cm bust & 112cm hips) 82.5cm long
Medium - 10-12 (90cm bust & 120cm hips) 85cm long
Large - 12- 14 (94cm bust & 124cm hips) 87.5cm long
XLarge - 16 (110cm bust & 140cm hips) 87.5cm long
***these are handmade so each garment might vary from these measurements slightly***

name: Elia Blouse
description:
The beautiful Elia blouse is 100% handmade and embriodered in Chiapas, Mexico. They are a rectangle cut but are simply beautiful on the figure. They are 100% cotton and a fabulous piece to wear throughout summer.

Each piece is unique and sizing is varied due to the hand made nature of the garment. We measure around the bust, please try to make sure you are slightly smaller than the piece you choose as we can not exchange exact pieces due to their individual nature.

Shown in the images are Blue with Gold and Red with Multi (pictured with the stunning KIKI Skirt)

name: Cielo Blouse
description:
The stunning Ceilo Blouse is covered in a colourful cross stitch, on both the front and the back. They are one of a kind pieces that will certainly make your heart sing. 

The blouses are a one size fits most (8-14) and can easily be worn throught the year. They are 100% cotton and handmade in Chiapas, Mexico.

name: Señora Las Flores
description:
The beautiful Las Flores is now be available for all the señora's out there! 

Hand made of 100% cotton and hand embroidered these are the perfect dress for summer and joy!

They are a straight and lose fit, just right for a stylish adventure!

Small - 8 (84cm bust & 112cm hips)
Medium - 10-12 (90cm bust & 120cm hips)
Large - 12- 14 (94cm bust & 124cm hips)
XLarge - 16 (110cm bust & 140cm hips)
***these are handmade so each garment might vary from these measurements slightly***

options.name: Small Black with RED and GREEN ONLY

name: Bettina Blouse
description:
The Bettina Blouse is a beautiful and elegant piece that takes up to 4 weeks to create. They are hand made and embroidered with sublime open crochet work. The artisan that creates this pieces is one of the most passionate I have met, it is so exciting to have some of her pieces.

The beautiful work is displayed on both the front and back and the work on and under the arms, so flattering to the figure.

The Bettina Blouse comes in a variety of colours and would best fit a size 12-16.

name: Maribel Blouse
description:
With the stunning hand cross stitch, the Maribel is a sweet blouse that is full of beauty and simplicity. Beautiful colours and lovely white muslin cotton, easy to wear and perfect for summer!

The stunning embroidery is on both front and back and on the tips of the sleeves.

name: Belia Blouse (3/4 Sleeve)
description:
Stunning Belia Blouse is 100% handmade (AMAZING) and is 100% cotton. These pieces vary in colours and sizes as they are all individually made by artisans. A beautiful piece that you will love for a lifetime.

*** we have more black with bone (like in the photo's) coming, please email me if you would like to preorder xx

name: Belia Blouse (short sleeve)
description:
Stunning Belia Blouse is 100% handmade (AMAZING) and is 100% cotton. These pieces vary in colours and sizes as they are all individually made by artisans. A beautiful piece that you will love for a lifetime.

The beautiful short sleeve is lovingly hand embroidered, such detail and beauty. Both the front and the back are adorned with the beatiful artisty, the artisans that make these pieces take three days just to make the one! AMAZING

options.name: Natural Calico with sage and blue (10-14)
Natural Calico with light blue, orange and green (8-10)

name: $100 Gift Voucher
description: For that special someone x

name: Tia Blouse
description:
The beautiful Tia Blouse is made from handwoven cotton with sweet hand embroidery on the décolletage and lace detail on the sleeve and hem, this really is a special piece. 

Made in Oaxaca each piece is unique.

name: Gypsy Blouse
description: Made from semi-translucent gauze (100% cotton), the Gypsy blouse is perfect for any occasion. If you have the legs, it can easily be worn as a dress or with skinny jeans or shorts. A stunning and light piece that is looking for a beautiful time.

name: Emelia Blouse
description:
The blouse is the most stunning piece that I came across in my recent travels. It is beyond beautiful and the artistry out of this world. 

It is 100% cotton and would best fit a size 10-12. It is certainly a once in a lifetime piece. A real treasure.

name: Dita Blouse
description:
Dita is a sweet little blouse that is beautifully embroidered on both the front and back. With contrasting colours it is a blouse that adds a little colour and style to your wardrobe. 

This is a smaller sizing and would suit a 8-12 best.

100% cotton and handmade in a village in Oaxaca, Mexico.

name: Coco Blouse
description:
The Coco blouse is a beautiful light weight blouse with a sweet cross stitch detail. A great blouse for every day and easy to wear. Each is unique and colours will vary.

One Size only 12-16 best fit
It is 80%cotton and 20% polyester.

name: $250 Gift Voucher
description: For that special someone x

name: Las Flores Mini
description:
Some call her a blouse and some call her a mini, she is the shortest Las Flores dress and perfect for the beach and summer. In winter pop a pair of skinny jeans or leggings on and you are good to go. 

Measurements:
Small - 8 (84cm bust & 112cm hips) 78cm long
Medium - 10-12 (90cm bust & 120cm hips) 80cm long
Large - 12- 14 (94cm bust & 124cm hips) 83cm long
XLarge - 16 (110cm bust & 140cm hips) 83cm long
***these are handmade so each garment might vary from these measurements slightly*** -

name: $200 Gift Voucher
description: For that special someone x

name: $50 Gift Voucher
description: For that special someone x

name: $150 Gift Voucher
description: For that special someone x

name: Diaz Bag
description:
The bags are made from natural leather and hand woven/ cross stitched fabrics on the exterior with padded lining in the interior. 
They have one interior pocket (with zip) and one exterior side pocket with zip a the back. They have both a shoulder strap and handles. They are handmade and have a lovely feel. 

They are an easy to carry and fabulous sized bag for everyday. 

They measure: 
approx 27cm, high39cm long and base is 12.5cm in depth. 

Each is unique and the colours vary

name: Isobel Dress
description:
The exquisite Isobel has the most beautiful hand embroidery on both the front and back. The embroidery frames the decolletage and neck and also covers the full capped sleeve, with a beautiful strip down the front center of the dress.

This is a very beautiful and special dress. 

Isobel would suit a large 8 - small 16. It is not a fitted dress and is meant to loosely hang on the figure. The stunning hand embroidery means that minimal jewelery need be worn, perhaps a pair of drop earrings. 

Isobel is a unique statement dress that would be perfect for a summer soiree. 

100% cotton and handmade in Mexico

name: Indio Dress
description:
Stunning embroidery on white cotton, this dress is simply irresistible! A piece to be worn at a special occasion or a lunch with the ladies. 

Each dress is hand embroidered and made by an artisan in Mexico.

They are all slightly different and we can not guarantee a repeat. 

If you are looking for something that is special and memorable, this is it! 

One size only but suits a large 8 - small 16. It is a lose flowing dress and the embroidery adds a beautiful shape to any figure, very flattering! Each measures around 100cm in length.

name: Sarita Dress
description:
The Sarita Dress is a fabulous piece for any lady's wardrobe. Great for summer as it is sleeveless and short, but completely perfect for winter with a cardi and with tights and long boots... see fabulous!

These divine pieces are made especially for Little Tienda in Oaxaca. They are lush 100% cotton and embroidered with love!

The measurement shown is the width of the embroidery that fits just above the bust and under the arms. I have found this is the most helpful way for you to gauge the best fit. Please note our new Sarita dresses are sized, thus small, medium, large and XLarge to make it easier xx

name: 100% Cotton Rebozo/ Scarf
description:
This stunning open weave scarf is handloomed in the southwest of Mexico. They are made from 100% cotton so will keep you warm in winter and cool in summer. 

Easy to wear and come in some beautiful colours.

name: Florecer Blouse
description:
Hand made and embroidered by artisans in Oaxaca Mexico, each shirt unique. A must for summer and can easily be worn over jeans in the cooler months. Stunning embroidered cotton with a light muslin under. 

A sublime piece for every lady's wardrobe. NOW in natural cotton too!

This is our most popular top, so easy to wear,

name: Alegre Skirt
description:
The Alegre Skirt is 100% cotton and handmade in Mexico. 

It is a one size only piece that has an elastic waistband. 

It works beautifully with a blouse or t-shirt and is great with stockings in the winter and on its own in the summer heat.

They are bought straight from the artisan (not factory produced) so we don't stock a zillion in each colour. If the colour you wanted is sold out, contact us. 

(these lovelies are somewhere between Oaxaca and Australia as we speak... allow 2 weeks for postage)

name: Girls 'las flores' Dress
description:
Handmade by artisans in Mexico, each dress has its own unique beauty. A beautiful piece for every little girl's collection. Gorgeous dress for everyday.

We now sell the lovely Las Flores dress in Size 0 and 1. 

This delightful dress comes in a variety of vibrant colours, including; red, pink, purple, orange, green, aqua and blue.

I have now added each colour in each size for you... hope it makes your decision easier x

name: Wee Birdy Blouse
description:
Delicate and sweet, the Wee Birdy Blouse is just that. Beautiful little bird embroidery adorns the front with a lovely hand stitched detail at the bottom of the blouse. It is a light cotton that fits easily. 

This is a smaller fit suited to a 10-12 size. Easy to wear in the summer and winter and the embroidery would shine either way. 

A very traditional style but such a special blouse, it is 100% hand stitched.

name: 100% Cotton Serape
description:
Belleza!

Divine 100% cotton Serape, perfect for summer! Each is like a unique tapestry. 

These blankets are beautiful and light. They will add a splash of colour to any room. We offer on size, the Grande would make an exquisite feature blanket on a double/ queen. They are frequently used as picnic blankets and throws.

The Serape's are very colourful. We offer you a selection of choices, but please note that this is the predominate colour only. Each Serape has several colours on them, it is what makes them so special.

Size - Grande L 202cm x W 150cm

name: Leather Bolsa with Handle
description:
This beautiful 100% hand tooled and hand made leather bag is such a great peice for any wardrobe. It has a lovely little handle and a shoulder strap too.Please note, there are slight natural scars on the leather, but they add to the character of the piece. 

The measurements are:
23cm high
33cm wide 
10cm wide at the base of the bag

name: Leather Bolsa
description:
This is a great little one pocket bag, 100% handtooled and hand made in Oaxaca Mexico, simple perfection. It has one pocket and a shoulder strap. Please note, there are slight natural scars on the leather, but they add to the character of the piece. 

The measurements are:
23cm high
31cm wide 
8cm wide at the base of the bag

name: Falsa Blanket
description:
The traditional 'Mexican Falsa Blanket' can be used as a cozy throw, bed spread or picnic blanket. Hand Woven in a colourful all over design, it is a perfect piece for any room. A lovely traditional piece from Mexico.

Falsa Blankets are also used by many as a yoga mat, as they are durable and soft plus light to carry.

50% acrylic, 40% polyester & 10% cotton

Size - L 185cm x W 125cm (size may vary slightly as it is hand made)

name: 100% Wool Hand Loomed Rug - Grande
description:
These stunning rugs are made from natural hand dyed wools using plant and aniline dyes. They are made in Michoacan Mexico by hand using wooden loomes by an artisan group. They are thick lush wool and just simply beautiful under foot. 

The Grande size is a beautiful size for most spaces,under a table or in a sitting area. It woul also be great for a bedroom.

The Grande measures 1.32m x 1.98m
Dry Clean or Hand Wash Only

We currently have the one piece available but we are getting more pieces and are happy to take preorders. As they are all made by hand, it takes time as they are made to order.

name: Novia Wrap
description:
Novia is a lush soft wrap that is full at the back with a slit at the front for maximum warmth and comfort.

This is a piece for the cooler months and you can easily pop it over any outfit with ease. 

It is one size only and made in Puebla, Mexico.

100% Acylic

name: 100% Wool Hand Loomed Rug - Mediano
description:
These stunning rugs are made from natural hand dyed wools using plant and aniline dyes. They are made in Michoacan Mexico by hand using wooden loomes by an artisan group. They are thick lush wool and just simply beautiful under foot. 

The mediano would be very suitable as a feature rug in a smaller space or at the end of a bed. They are a lovely size if you are looking for a quality piece, but not to cover a large area. 

The mediano measures 91.5cm x 142cm
Dry Clean or Hand Wash Only

We currently have the one piece available but we are getting more pieces and are happy to take preorders. As they are all made by hand, it takes time and they are made to order.

name: Serape
description:
They bring a vibrancy to the room and immediately make you think of a market in Mexico. Perfect for adding colour to your everyday life.

These Serape are 100% acrylic so the colours are brighter than the more subtle earthy hue's of the Cotton Serape. They are also slightly thicker because of the yarn. 

Two sizes available in the Serape, Grande and Mediano. 

Size - Grande L 202cm x W 150cm
          Mediano L 194cm x W 117cm

name: Solid Colour Blanket
description:
Sublime hand woven Solid Colour Blanket. 
Perfect for a bed or to keep you warm in the cooler months as you get comfy on a chair or couch. A lovely variety of colours available. 

These are a thicker weave than the Serape or Flasa.

Size  - 130cm x 190cm (size may vary slightly as it is hand woven)
50% acrylic, 40% polyester & 10% cotton

name: Blue Throw/ Table Cloth
description:
This beautiful piece can be anything you want it to be. The blue and white work so well together and as it is hand woven you can really see the beauty in the detail. The lovely central aztec motifs provide a nice balance to the textile too.

measures: 145cm (without fringe) x 128cm
gentle cold machine wash

name: Come fly with me heart...
description:
This beautiful handmade tin heart with mirror and wings is ready to hang on your wall. 

Measures approx 40cm (wing tip to wing tip...) x 19cm

name: Delicate Mirrored Tin Heart
description:
Lovely Delicate Mirrored Tin Heart with flames, ready for a wall near you!

Measures approx 27cm x 20.5cm

name: Mega Love Tin Heart
description:
The Mega Love Tin Heart is a beautiful piece ready to hang! 

Measures approx 34cm x 23cm

name: Sacred Tin Heart
description:
This rad Scared Tin Heart with mirror is ready to hang and looking for a fabulous new home!

Measures approx 37cm x 20cm

name: Aztec Tin Heart
description:
Beautiful light Aztec Tin Heart is a lovely piece for the wall. 

Measures approx 24cm x 15.5cm

These simple hearts look great in a cluster as a wall feature too!

name: Lets Fly Heart
description:
Beautiful and delicate the Tin heart with wings really is a sweet piece for the wall. (each design will vary slightly, all are lovely)

Measures approx 27cm x 14cm

These simple hearts look great in a cluster as a wall feature too!

name: Embroidered Smock
description:
Dainty embroidered smock is made from muslin with a beautiful colourful stitched collar. 

Would suit a size 10-14 as the collar is stiff and needs a broader shoulder. Stunning on and so easy to wear.

name: Girls White 'las flores' Dress
description:
Handmade by artisans in Mexico, each dress has its own unique beauty. Delightful and colourful embroidery make this dress very special and fun to wear. 

A beautiful piece for every little girl's collection.

name: Girls La Flor Blouse
description:
Vibrant, happy, colourful 100% cotton, handmade and embroidered in Mexico, these little blouses are too sweet!

They are a smock fit and have elastic around the sleeve on the arm to add a little 'puff'. They are just a perfect little blouse to add to any wardrobe and could be worn with tights, leggings, skirts, shorts and even a tutu! 

These are a small fit around the neckline, this is a guide.
Size 2  - fit up to 18months 
Size 4 -  18months - 3 years
Size 6 -  4 - 6
Size 8 -  6 upwards

name: Nina Rag Doll
description:
Delightful Nina would be a treasured doll in any girls world.

Handmade in Oaxaca, the Nina Rag Doll is a lovely toy for every little la chica. They have moveable arms and legs and are clothed in divine traditional Oaxacan dress. Beautiful and fun.. Perfect!

Nina is 30cm in length.

(please note that the clothes are sewn on)
